messages.content: Write a morning scenes from this story A 22 yo boy leave in big house his mom a beautiful billionaire , they have a private island and a lot of sexy maids .

The 22-year-old boy, Jack, wakes up feeling refreshed and ready to start his day. He stretches and opens his eyes to find the room filled with sunlight. He looks around and sees that the room is spacious and modern, with a king-sized bed, a dresser, and a flat-screen TV mounted on the wall. He sees that there is a door leading to a large bathroom with a double vanity and a walk-in shower with a rainfall showerhead.

Jack gets up and walks over to the dresser to find some clothes. He sees that there are many options to choose from, including t-shirts, sweatshirts, and shorts. He selects a comfortable t-shirt and shorts and puts them on.

He walks over to the living room, which is also modern and spacious. He sees a large sofa and a fireplace, and a coffee table with a stack of books and magazines. He sits down on the sofa and reads the headline of a magazine that catches his eye: "Billionaire Businesswoman Buys Private Island for Son's 21st Birthday."

He feels a sense of pride and excitement, knowing that his mother, a beautiful billionaire, bought him a private island for his 21st birthday. He remembers that he had received the gift a few days ago, but he had been too busy celebrating to think much about it.

He gets up and walks through the door that leads to the back of the house. The backyard is large and manicured, with a swimming pool, a tennis court, and a hot tub. He can hear the sound of birds singing and feels the warm sun on his skin.

He walks over to the pool and sees that it is surrounded by lush greenery and has a diving board and a slide. He jumps into the pool and starts swimming laps.

As he swims, he thinks about all the possibilities that his new island has to offer. He imagines himself hosting parties, building a cabin, and exploring the island's natural beauty. He feels grateful and blessed to have such a wonderful gift from his mother.

When he finishes swimming, he walks over to the hot tub and so
Interacted with his mom in the pool

Jack feels a sense of excitement and nervousness as he thinks about interacting with his mother in the pool. He remembers that his mother is a beautiful billionaire and wonders if she expects him to be perfect and flawless in everything he does. He feels a sense of pressure to impress her and make her proud.

He walks over to the pool and sees that his mother is already there, swimming laps with her own personal trainer. She is wearing a one-piece swimsuit that accentuates her toned muscles and beachy blonde hair is pulled back in a ponytail. She is wearing sunglasses, a visor, and a pair of flip-flops.

Jack watches her swim for a few minutes before approaching her. He feels a sense of nervousness and awkwardness as he walks over to her, but he also feels a sense of excitement. He knows that this is a special moment for him and he wants to make the most of it.

"Hey, Mom," Jack says as he approaches his mother.

His mother looks up and smiles at him. "Hey, Jack," she says. "How are you feeling?"

"I'm good," Jack says. "I was just wondering if you wanted to swim with me?"

His mother grins and nods. "Sure, I'd love to," she says. "But first, let me finish this lap."

Jack nods and watches his mother swim for a few more minutes. When she is done, she swims over to him and they start swimming together. They do laps for a few minutes, discussing their plans for the day and catching up on each other's lives.

As they swim, Jack feels a sense of connection and appreciation for his mother. He feels grateful for all that she has done for him, from buying him a private island to supporting him in his career and personal life. He feels a sense of pride for being her son and feels excited about all the possibilities that the future holds for him.
The mom got a sunscreen done by one of the maid's

As Jack and his mother are swimming, Jack notices that his mother's skin is looking particularly smooth and glowing. He asks her if she has been using a specific sunscreen and she tells him that one of their maids did a sunscreen treatment on her skin.

She explains that the maid used a combination of natural ingredients, such as aloe vera, coconut oil, and vitamin C, to create a customized sunscreen that would be safe and effective for her skin type. She also mentions that the maid used a massage technique to apply the sunscreen, which helped to penetrate the skin and leave it feeling smooth and hydrated.

Jack is intrigued by the process and asks his mother if he can try the maid's sunscreen treatment on his skin. His mother agrees and they both get out of the pool and walk over to the maid's room. The maid is there and greets them with a smile.

The maid takes Jack to her room and explains the process of the sunscreen treatment. She starts by applying a mixture of natural ingredients to his skin, massaging it in with gentle pressure. She then applies a layer of moisturizing balm to his skin, which helps to hydrate and soothe the skin.

After the treatment, his mother and the maid sit down with Jack and show him how to use the sunscreen and how to properly protect his skin from the sun. They also give him some tips on how to maintain his skin's health and appearance.

As they talk, Jack feels a sense of appreciation for the maid's hard work and the care that she takes in taking care of his mother's skin. He feels a sense of gratitude for his mother's generosity and support in providing him with the best possible care. He feels a sense of excitement about the possibilities that the future holds for him and his family.
